item.description:
Hey, everyone! It's time for another gathering of the Who Moved My Cheese? crowd at Dodge Hall. We all thought it was a great location last time, so we'll keep it there, but we will change the time slightly. We are now meeting at 2pm instead of 1pm.

THINGS TO KEEP IN MIND:
1. Please be ON TIME...it is very difficult to add in a player who is late. The game starts at 2pm sharp. You may want to arrive a bit early if need be.

2. Bring your calculators

3. Bring your favorite pencils and erasers (if you have them). We do provide pencils and erasers, but some people are just picky!

There is plenty of metered parking on Huntington Ave, and it's free since it's Sunday.

As always, please keep up your RSVP count. You guys did such a great job last time, what with the weather and all. It really does help make things easier.

See you there!


--Russ
item.how_to_find_us: Enter Dodge and we'll be in one of the classrooms on the LEFT
item.name: January 25 Cashflow Meetup
